settings.text: As winter draws to a close, there’s no better time to rejuvenate your wardrobe. A complete clear out won’t be necessary, these spring outfit formulas will breathe new life into your cold weather rotation. From skirts and dresses that are perfect for the rare spring sunshine, to cashmere sweaters that’ll prepare you for unpredictable temperatures, our collection of essentials will last you throughout the season - and then some.

settings.title: A shift in what fashion lovers’ wardrobes…
settings.text:
During the pandemic, fashion took a backstep with the rise of athleisure taking centre stage as comfort became a priority for those working from home days and daily walks, with no real need to pull together an outfit that expressed our identity.

In fact, it was more the mood of the nation that dictated fashion, with neutral hoodies and loungewear dominating the sales of many fashion brands, including here at Chinti & Parker.

Rachael Wood, co-founder and director of Chinti & Parker said “During the periods where restrictions were in place, there was a huge shift towards hoodies and our Essentials collection, with people opting for beige, white, grey and more neutral, staple items.

However, what we’ve seen since the beginning of S/S ‘22 and into A/W ‘22 is a real shift, as people once again look to resurrect their own style and express themselves through what they wear.”

Which got us thinking, just how much have people’s attitudes changed towards the colours they’re embracing?

settings.grid-content:
Roll neck dress and trench coat


The timeless trench is the epitome of spring style. It’ll not only keep you warm and dry throughout the day, but its versatility means it pairs beautifully with just about anything. Our favourite is the classic trench and Roll Neck Dress - an ensemble that’s as flattering as it is practical.

Wide leg pants and cropped cashmere sweater co-ord

Spring is all about embracing change, which is why incorporating new, vibrant colours into your wardrobe is a must. However, the biggest challenge of a new palette is finding the best colour combinations. Eradicate uncertainty by opting for a chic, monochromatic look, and dress head to toe in a shade that nods at the new season. Our Slouchy Sweater and Wide-Leg Track Pants co-ord marries comfort with elegance. Whether you’re relaxing on the weekend, or heading out for brunch with friends, this partnering has got you covered.

Ribbed cardigan and straight-leg jeans


A Cashmere Cardigan is an essential part of the modern woman’s wardrobe, being especially useful when spring rolls around. Not only is the material lightweight and breathable - making it perfect for layering over a basic T-Shirt - it can also be worn as a standalone statement piece thanks to the wide range of colours and patterns available. Complete your look with a comfortable pair of straight-leg jeans and minimalist trainers for relaxed, yet refined style. If the weather allows it, a midi skirt and knee high boots can add an element of sophistication to your look.


Bold Tee and neutral bottoms


Although we encourage embracing a new, brighter colour palette this spring, your neutrals will still come in handy. The beauty of minimalist pieces is that there are no limits to their pairings, so partnering neutral bottoms with a bold Tee won’t result in an unflattering colour clash.

settings.text: Amongst our collection of T-Shirts and tops, you’ll find an array of striking patterns, nostalgic numbers, and playful slogans - all of which will add instant playfulness to your spring wardrobe.

Knitted tank top and long-sleeved shirt


Knitwear isn’t just for winter. All our pieces are crafted sustainably from the finest materials, and a wool-cashmere blend both keeps off the chill, and regulates your body temperature during warmer periods. Our tank top is no exception, and is just what you need for spring. This sleeveless style can either be worn alone, or it can be layered over a crisp, long-sleeved shirt if the weather is cooler. When paired with Cashmere Wide-Leg Pants, you’ll have all the essential components for flawless spring style.
